list.title: SidechatAsset
list.description: An asset object, containing information about an image within a post or comment

list.title: SidechatCursorString
list.description: A cursor for paginating through post lists

list.title: SidechatGroup
list.description: A group object, containing metadata about a group as well as its join conditions and states

list.title: SidechatPostOrComment
list.description: A user-created post or comment, depending on the "type" prop

list.title: SidechatPrivateAssetURL
list.description: An asset URL that can only be accessed by making a request with a user's bearer token attached in the Authorization header

list.title: SidechatVoteString
list.description: Represents a vote on a comment or post

list.title: checkEmailVerification
list.description: Check is the user's email is verified.

list.title: getAvailableGroups
list.description: Gets groups to be displayed on the "Explore Groups" page

list.title: getGroupPosts
list.description: Fetches posts from the specified category in a group

list.title: getPostComments
list.description: Get all the commments on a post

list.title: getUserAndGroup
list.description: Get updated status for user and group

list.title: loginViaSMS
list.description: Initiate the login process with a phone number. Should be followed up with verifySMSCode().

list.title: registerEmail
list.description: Initiate the email setup process. Should be followed up with checkEmailVerification().

list.title: setDeviceID
list.description: Set the device ID of the current user

list.title: setVote
list.description: Upvote or downvote, or unvote a post

list.title: verifySMSCode
list.description: Verify the code sent via SMS with loginViaSMS().
